response.overview: John Williams, a British director who continues to work in Japan such as "the most beautiful summer" and "starfish Hotel," fills Franz Kafka's absurd literature "judgment" on the stage of modern Tokyo. A man of a banker wakes up at his home mansion on his 30th birthday, and there were two strangers in the room. Although they say that they have arrested Kimura, the crime is unclear, and if Kimura insists on innocence, the system would not be able to move into a spider like system. Even if he desires for salvation, he disagrees, and Kimura begins to notice the end of this maze without the exit. Starring the film debut with "the most beautiful summer", and it is an individuality actor who works in "industrial elegance Valley boys the movie" etc. Yakuro Bando, a leading actor of Kabuki play, played a special role.
